title: Maldives Family-Friendly Overwater Suites with Fun-Filled Activities & Club Med Spa
description:
Embrace the magic of the Maldives at this resort set on a private island in the North Malé Atoll. Stretching along two kilometers of pristine beach, this tropical retreat offers endless opportunities to unwind or dive into adventure - whether it’s snorkelling over vibrant coral reefs, flying through the air on the island’s flying trapeze or embracing high-energy water sports in the crystal-clear lagoon.

Savour local and international flavours at a variety of dining venues, from buffet-style gourmet cuisine at The Vehli to a la carte dishes overlooking the Indian Ocean at the Kandu. With its stunning natural beauty, family-friendly amenities and relaxing spa offerings, Club Med Kani - Maldives is the ultimate paradise.
